about.title: About Me
about.description: Systems Analyst and Software Developer with experience in frontend and backend development, REST API design and building systems oriented to solving real problems. I work with FastAPI, Flask, React and relational databases (SQLite, PostgreSQL). I have experience in academic projects, applied research and personal development, including containers with Docker, distributed systems, observability and process automation. I am currently studying for a Bachelor's degree in Computer Systems and looking for opportunities to continue growing in software projects with real impact.
